insert.if: insert into events(eventSeq, userID, summary, description, startDate, endDate, color) values(null, #{userID}, #{summary}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{color})
insert into events(eventSeq, projectSeq, summary, description, startDate, endDate, color) values(null, #{projectSeq}, #{summary}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{color})

mapper.select: select * from events where userID = #{userID} or projectSeq in (select projectSeq from joinProject where userID = #{userID})
